bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum alloy race frame, "Hemi" monocoque top tube, manipulated 44mm DT, forged 68mm Euro BB shell, triple void extrusion chainstay/BB yoke, forged/relieved D.O., integrated chain tensioner.
